logic.users

Class CarManufacturingCompany

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.users.CarManufacturingCompany

  • public class CarManufacturingCompany
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to describe a car manufacturing company.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CarManufacturingCompany()
      Makes a new car manufacturing company.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Adds the given order to the assembly line if the given order is not null.

      Returns the car orders that would be on the assembly line if the assembly line was progressed.

      Returns the current time in this factory.

      Checks if the given user name is valid and returns the corresponding user.

      Moves the assembly line forward if every work station is ready and sets the end time of the first order to the given end time.
      void progressTime(int mins)
      Progresses the time without moving the assembly line for example when handling emergency situations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CarManufacturingCompany

        public CarManufacturingCompany()

    • Method Detail

      • logIn

        public User logIn(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks if the given user name is valid and returns the corresponding user. If the given user name is valid and the user does not exist yet, the user is added to the HashMap of users. If the given user name is not valid, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name used to login.
        Returns:
        Returns the user corresponding to the given user name otherwise if: - the HashMap of users contains the given user name as a key, - the list of valid manager names contains the given user name, - the list of valid garage holders names contains the given user name or - the list of valid mechanic names contains the given user name. Returns null otherwise.

      • addOrder

        public void addOrder(CarOrder order)
        Adds the given order to the assembly line if the given order is not null.
        Parameters:
        order - The order which needs to be added to the assembly line.

      • getWorkStations

        public Workstation[] getWorkStations()
        Method to return the list of workstations of the assembly line of this car manufacturing company.
        Returns:
        The workstations of the assembly line.

      • moveAssemblyLine

        public boolean moveAssemblyLine(int shiftDuration)
        Moves the assembly line forward if every work station is ready and sets the end time of the first order to the given end time.
        Returns:
        True if the assembly line can be moved. False if the assembly line can not be moved.

      • askFutureSchedule

        public java.util.List<CarOrder> askFutureSchedule()
        Returns the car orders that would be on the assembly line if the assembly line was progressed.
        Returns:
        The list of car orders.

      • getCurrentTime

        public org.joda.time.DateTime getCurrentTime()
        Returns the current time in this factory.
        Returns:
        The current time (immutable)

      • progressTime

        public void progressTime(int mins)
        Progresses the time without moving the assembly line for example when handling emergency situations.
        Parameters:
        mins -
